Description of incident: Digital Theatre, LLC which operates ShowTix4U notified individuals of a data breach when some payment cards were affected. Investigators found between late April 2015 and late September 2015 unauthorized access was discovered on a computer server hosting ShowTix4U's website. The information compromised names, addresses, payment card account numbers, card expiration dates, and payment card security codes of customers. More information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-58535
